[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@vue-storefront/odoo-api](./odoo-api.md)

## odoo-api package

`api-client` for Odoo integration for Vue Storefront 2.

## Remarks

The `@vue-storefront/odoo` library includes everything needed to fetch data from the Odoo eCommerce platform.
